sections.heading: Deceased or interdicted succession representativeIf a succession representative dies or is interdicted, an account of his administration may be filed by his heirs or by his legal representative; and upon the petition of an interested person the court shall order the filing of such an account
sections.text: Deceased or interdicted succession representativeIf a succession representative dies or is interdicted, an account of his administration may be filed by his heirs or by his legal representative; and upon the petition of an interested person the court shall order the filing of such an account.
